duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support for validation programs and processes.
Conduct critical analysis of situations and provide recommendations.
Work independently with structured guidance to support engineering activities.
Facilitate the development and validation of test methods and processes.
Utilize process capability and statistics to support manufacturing operations.
Apply quality engineering principles to ensure compliance with ISO13485 standards.
Perform clean room manufacturing activities for small components to tight tolerances.
Demonstrate attention to detail and critical thinking in all engineering activities.
Travel to Buffalo, NJ for project-related activities (20-30% travel expected).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Science or Engineering (or equivalent experience)
